name: Sockventure: Prologue
description:
ADD FULL GAME TO YOUR WISHLIST
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1222340


Sockventure is a story about a kid whose favorite sock gets eaten by a cursed washing machine. Kid needs immediate help and calls superhero Supersock to the rescue and the adventure begins. Help Supersock to find his way through the dangerous levels to find the missing sock inside the washing machine!



Beat over 50 levels of hardcore platforming, get new skills such as double jumping, wall jumping and dashing and bring the socks back safely. Collect coins, find the missing socks and customize your character with multiple unique outfits.

Features

  • 50+ Levels - Over 50 handcrafted Levels.
  • Special Skills - Get new Skills during the game. Wall jumping, double jumping and dashing.
  • Challenges - Multiple Challenges to beat.
  • Leaderboards - Try to get to the top of global and friends leaderboards.
  • Socks - Find hidden Socks and use them as your Skin.
  • Coins - Find and collect all the coins to unlock Dark World.
  • Dark World - The Dark World offers new more challenging Levels to test your skills in.
